hero.title: Agilent Maritime Services Limited
hero.subtitle: Leading Stevedore Shipping Services and Maritime Logistics Solutions at Tema Port, Ghana. Professional vehicle shipping and cargo handling across West Africa.
hero.extendedDescription: Premier Roll-on/Roll-off (RoRo) specialist in West Africa, handling 400,000+ vehicles annually at Tema Port, Ghana. With 15+ years of maritime excellence, we provide comprehensive stevedoring and port services across the region.

services.title: Maritime Services
services.subtitle: Professional stevedoring and port services tailored to meet the demands of modern maritime commerce.

items.title: Heavy Lift & Project Cargo
items.description: Expert handling of oversized cargo, breakbulk, and project shipments with specialized equipment.
items.details: Handling cargo up to 450 tons with precision cranes, specialized transport, and custom engineering solutions. 15+ years experience in complex project logistics.

items.title: Bulk & Break Bulk Operations
items.description: Comprehensive dry bulk commodity handling including grains, minerals, and steel products.
items.details: State-of-the-art bulk handling facilities with 25,000 sqm storage capacity, automated loading systems, and climate-controlled storage options.

items.title: Ro/Ro & Vehicle Handling
items.description: Professional roll-on/roll-off operations for cars, trucks, trailers, and construction equipment.
items.details: West Africa's premier RoRo terminal handling 400,000+ vehicles annually with dedicated ramps, vehicle storage areas, and specialized handling equipment.

items.title: Safety & Quality Assurance
items.description: ISO-certified HSSEQ management ensuring zero incidents through rigorous safety protocols.
items.details: ISO 9001:2015 certified with 98% safety record, comprehensive training programs, and continuous improvement initiatives across all operations.

items.title: Ship Agency & Documentation
items.description: Full-service port agency including customs clearance, maritime documentation, and crew services.
items.details: Complete port agency services with 24/7 support, customs expertise, maritime documentation, crew services, and vessel coordination.

items.title: Cargo Storage & Logistics
items.description: Climate-controlled warehousing, container stuffing/stripping, and inventory management.
items.details: Modern warehousing facilities with 50,000 sqm capacity, container handling, inventory management, and integrated logistics solutions.

items.title: Warehousing
items.description: Storage of any kind of commodities, storage hotel and bonded warehouse services.
items.details: Comprehensive warehousing solutions including bonded warehouse facilities, storage hotel services, and specialized commodity storage for various cargo types.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Explore our comprehensive fleet of vessels handled at Tema Port.

reports.title: Reports
reports.subtitle: Comprehensive reports and documentation for our maritime operations.

footer.description: Leading Roll-on/Roll-off specialist at Tema Port, Ghana. Professional maritime logistics solutions with over 15 years of experience in West Africa.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: Ships make money at sea when they are carrying cargo between ports, therefore, ports and terminals need to be efficient to minimise port time and get the ship back on its journey as soon as possible.
mission.description2: Agilent Maritime is a premier Roll-on/Roll-off (RoRo) specialist handling over 400,000 RoRo units annually for major RoRo carriers throughout Africa. As a commercial stevedoring company, Agilent Maritime contracts with terminal owners to manage all terminal operations and provides full RoRo Stevedoring and Terminal Services for all types, sizes, shapes, high and heavy cargoes.

stats.label: RoRo units handled annually
stats.description: Major RoRo carriers served throughout Africa

stats.label: Cargo Handling
stats.description: Sizes, shapes, high and heavy cargoes

items.name: Ghana Ports and Harbours Authority
items.description: Official port authority managing Tema Port operations and infrastructure

items.name: Meridian Port Services
items.description: Delivering world-class container terminal services at Tema Port

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by leading companies across Africa for exceptional maritime services

items.quote: When we needed to ship a 85-ton transformer to Southeast Asia, other freight forwarders said it was impossible. Agilent Maritime Services not only accepted the challenge but delivered flawlessly. Their team calculated every detail - from crane specifications to route planning - and coordinated with multiple ports to ensure safe passage. Their expertise in out-of-gauge cargo is unmatched.
items.name: Takeshi Yamamoto
items.title: Logistics Manager - Heavy Machinery Corp

items.quote: Agilent's stevedores handled our 45,000-ton iron ore cargo with remarkable precision. Their attention to proper weight distribution and hull protection gave us complete confidence throughout the operation. Loading was completed 6 hours ahead of schedule without a single safety incident. Their bulk cargo expertise clearly shows in every operation.
items.name: Captain Maria Santos
items.title: Vessel Operations - Atlantic Shipping Lines

items.quote: Rolling 200 vehicles on and off vessels requires absolute precision. Agilent's team demonstrated meticulous attention to detail - from securing each vehicle to monitoring weather conditions during operations. We've never had damage to our cargo under their supervision. Their Ro/Ro expertise is exactly what we need for our automotive exports.
items.name: Hans Mueller
items.title: Export Director - European Auto Group

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to optimize your maritime operations? Contact us today to discuss your stevedoring and terminal service needs.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your maritime logistics needs...
form.success: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.

testimonial.quote: At our core, we believe every cargo movement tells a story of trust. Our customers aren't just clientsâ€”they're partners whose success defines our purpose. In stevedoring, there's no room for compromise on safety or service. When we handle their vessels, we're handling their reputation, their commitments, and their future. Our customers trust us with their most valuable assets, and we honor that trust with precision, care, and an unwavering commitment to operational excellence in every port we serve.
testimonial.name: Kofi Mitchell Webb
testimonial.title: Managing Director

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: From the first point in the ship's or ship's hold to the first point on the quay or vice versa - comprehensive stevedoring and terminal services.

detailedServices.title: Our Services
detailedServices.subtitle: From the first point in the ship's or ship's hold to the first point on the quay or vice versa - comprehensive stevedoring and terminal services.

services.title: Oversized Cargo
services.description: The bigger, the better. Our freight forwarding team, specialised in oversized cargo, likes challenges. They will never complain about your cargo being out-of-gauge. They are experienced and qualified to find a solution.

services.title: Bulk Cargo
services.description: Our experienced stevedores make sure that all bulk cargo loading and unloading operations are carried out in a manner that protects both the cargo and the hull structure of the bulk carrier and themselves of course.

services.title: Ro/Ro Shipments
services.description: Rolling the cargo on and off the vessel must be carried out with attention to detail. We know that the slightest wrong turn or inattention may prove costly. We always keep an eye on the cargo and vessel.

services.title: Container Handling
services.description: Professional container operations with modern equipment and experienced teams for all container types and sizes.

services.title: Heavy Lift
services.description: Expert handling of heavy and oversized cargo with specialized lifting equipment and experienced personnel.

services.title: Warehousing
services.description: Storage of any kind of commodities, storage hotel and bonded warehouse facilities to meet all your cargo storage and handling requirements.

portOperations.subtitle: Professional maritime operations with modern equipment and experienced workforce.

hero.title: Proudly Ghanaian
hero.subtitle: Premier RoRo specialist at Tema Port, Ghana, handling 400,000+ vehicles annually with deep local expertise, strong community partnerships, and commitment to Ghana's economic development. Operating at the Greenwich Meridian - the world's center point.

strategicPosition.title: Ghana's Strategic Position
strategicPosition.subtitle: Located at the Greenwich Meridian (0Â°00'), Ghana serves as West Africa's premier maritime gateway, connecting global trade routes and serving landlocked nations across the region.

highlights.description: Operating at 0Â°00' longitude - the world's center point for global time and navigation.

highlights.title: Gateway to West Africa
highlights.description: Serving landlocked countries including Burkina Faso, Mali, and Niger with efficient logistics.

highlights.title: Economic Hub
highlights.description: Ghana's $75.49B GDP economy drives regional trade and maritime commerce growth.

ghanaAdvantage.title: Our Ghana Advantage

highlights.title: Economic Impact
highlights.description: Contributing significantly to Ghana's maritime sector growth and regional trade.

highlights.title: Infrastructure
highlights.description: State-of-the-art facilities and modern equipment specifically designed for RoRo operations.

leadership.title: Local Leadership, Global Standards
leadership.subtitle: Our Ghana operations are led by experienced local professionals who understand both the regional market dynamics and international maritime standards, ensuring premier RoRo services at Tema Port.

teamMembers.name: Kofi Mitchell Webb
teamMembers.description: Leading Agilent Maritime with extensive experience in maritime operations and strategic management. Former GPHA operations manager with deep understanding of regional trade patterns and port operations.
teamMembers.extendedBio: Kofi Mitchell Webb brings over 15 years of maritime expertise to Agilent Maritime, having previously served in senior roles at Ghana Ports and Harbours Authority (GPHA). He holds advanced qualifications in Maritime Studies and has been instrumental in developing Tema Port's RoRo capabilities. Kofi's deep understanding of West African trade patterns and his extensive network across the region make him an invaluable leader for our operations.

teamMembers.name: Maabena Webb
teamMembers.description: Managing financial operations and administrative functions with extensive experience in maritime business administration and financial management.
teamMembers.extendedBio: Maabena Webb oversees all financial operations and administrative functions at Agilent Maritime. With extensive experience in maritime business administration, she ensures financial stability and operational efficiency across all our port operations. Her expertise in financial planning and maritime business administration makes her a key leader in our organization.

teamMembers.name: Welbeck Damoah
teamMembers.description: Managing day-to-day operations at Tema Port with specialized experience in RoRo operations and cargo handling. Certified in maritime safety and port management.
teamMembers.extendedBio: Welbeck Damoah manages daily operations at Tema Port with extensive experience in RoRo operations and cargo handling. He holds multiple maritime certifications and has been instrumental in maintaining our high operational standards. His hands-on approach and attention to detail have contributed to our excellent success rate in vehicle handling operations.

partnerships.title: Strategic Partnerships
partnerships.subtitle: Building strong relationships across Ghana's maritime ecosystem for premier RoRo operations.

partnerships.name: Ghana Ports and Harbours Authority
partnerships.description: Long-term collaboration since 2010 for port development and operations. Official RoRo terminal operator at Tema Port with exclusive rights for vehicle handling.

partnerships.name: Meridian Port Services
partnerships.description: Strategic partnership for container terminal services at Tema Port Terminal 3. Collaborative approach to port modernization and efficiency improvements.

operations.title: Our Ghana Operations
operations.subtitle: Operating at Tema Port, Ghana's premier maritime gateway, we provide comprehensive RoRo and maritime logistics services across West Africa. Tema Port handles 80% of Ghana's national trade and serves as the primary gateway for landlocked countries in the region.

services.title: RoRo Operations
services.description: Premier Roll-on/Roll-off specialist handling 400,000+ vehicles annually at Tema Port. Dedicated terminals with specialized equipment for cars, trucks, and heavy machinery.

services.title: Cargo Handling
services.description: Professional stevedoring and cargo handling services with modern equipment and experienced teams. ISO-certified operations with 99.8% on-time delivery record.

services.title: Strategic Location
services.description: Positioned at Tema Port, Ghana's gateway to West Africa with excellent connectivity. Serving landlocked countries including Burkina Faso, Mali, and Niger. Located at 5.6667Â°N, 0.0167Â°W on the Greenwich Meridian.

items.quote: Toen we een 85-ton transformator naar Zuidoost-AziÃ« moesten verschepen, zeiden andere vrachtagenten dat het onmogelijk was. Agilent Maritime Services accepteerde niet alleen de uitdaging maar leverde het vlekkeloos af. Hun team berekende elk detail - van kraanspecificaties tot routeplanning - en coÃ¶rdineerde met meerdere havens om veilige doorgang te verzekeren. Hun expertise in buitenmaatse lading is ongeÃ«venaard.
items.name: Takeshi Yamamoto
items.title: Logistiek Manager - Zwaar Materieel Corporatie

items.quote: Agilent's stuwadoors behandelden onze 45.000-ton ijzererts lading met opmerkelijke precisie. Hun aandacht voor juiste gewichtsverdeling en rompbescherming gaf ons volledig vertrouwen gedurende de hele operatie. Laden werd 6 uur voor schema voltooid zonder een enkel veiligheidsincident. Hun bulk lading expertise toont zich duidelijk in elke operatie.
items.name: Kapitein Maria Santos
items.title: Schip Operaties - Atlantic Shipping Lines

items.quote: Het rollen van 200 voertuigen op en van schepen vereist absolute precisie. Agilent's team toonde nauwgezette aandacht voor detail - van het beveiligen van elk voertuig tot het monitoren van weersomstandigheden tijdens operaties. We hebben nooit schade aan onze lading gehad onder hun toezicht. Hun Ro/Ro expertise is precies wat we nodig hebben voor onze auto-exporten.

In stuwadoorwerk is er geen ruimte voor compromissen op veiligheid of service. Wanneer we hun schepen behandelen, behandelen we hun reputatie, hun verplichtingen en hun toekomst. Onze klanten vertrouwen ons hun meest waardevolle activa toe, en we eren dat vertrouwen met precisie, zorg en een onwrikbare toewijding aan operationele excellentie in elke haven die we bedienen.
